Hi! I'm Lark! Welcome to my extra channel where i upload the latest crypto news. I'm a Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, and stock investor with years of experience making consistent profits in this market. I created this channel to help you learn about cryptocurrency investing so you can diversify your portfolio, grow your wealth, and make money. Check out my courses and newsletter if you are new to crypto!

Please note: I will never approach you with a promotional offer. I will never approach you asking about an investment opportunity or mining or trading arbitrage. Anyone claiming to represent me is a scammer.
